clients.title: GoDaddy Confirmed a Data Breach with 28,000 Customers Affected
description: GoDaddy recently confirmed a data breach on web hosting credentials for 28,000 customers. They note that the incident is limited in scope to the web hosting account and your main GoDaddy customer account was not accessed. You would only be affected if you use GoDaddy web hosting (if you have a Justia website, we host your site on our servers). That said, we recommend reviewing and updating your GoDaddy password to be on the safe side.
